turkish_example_sentence: Ben hiçbir hata yapmayacaktım ama dikkat etmedim.
english_example_sentence: I was not going to make any mistake but I was not careful.
russian_example_sentence: Я не собирался делать никакую ошибку, но я не был внимателен.
